 Alumnus David Jhave Johnston publishes: Aesthetic Animism  
 Posted on October 12, 2016 
 Congratulations to Humanities alumnus  David Jhave Johnston  on the publication of  Aesthetic Animism: Digital Poetry's Ontological Implications   (MIT Press, 2016): “It is one of a kind in its field – inventive, historical, and complicated in its mix of interdisciplinary discourses” (Prof. Johanna Drucker, U of California LA)
